name: Quest to Defeat The Hydra
description:
Defeat a giant hydra boss as an alien! Controls are below. And you can tell this game was made from the Space Shooter template in GDEVELOP 5.

Left Click/Space: Fire

WASD/Arrow Keys: Move around (ur alien will also move to the place u click)

Middle Click: Transform from Beetle to Snapper (and the other way around) (you can also press the change button

You can also drink dani milk  collect hearts to heal up!
